full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I SMON LAM SHIS BRJOD DANG BCAS PA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,CES DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I SMON LAM SHIS BRJOD DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI, MKHAS GRUB CHOS KYI RGYAL POS MDZAD PA'I DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I MCHOD @012B 'PHRENG LAS, MJUG TU SMON LAM BKRA SHIS RGYAS PAR BYA'O, ,ZHES GSUNG BA'I DGONGS PA KHA BKANGS STE, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO GROS KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I BSTAN PA YUN RING DU GNAS SHING, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I GO 'PHANG THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,
author_simple: MKHAS GRUB CHOS KYI RGYAL PO,
